name: Crazy Parkour
description:
Crazy Parkour is an extreme parkour game that brings 36 unique levels for you to play. Not only jumping and falling, but this parkour game will make you feel like a real pro where you can climb on the edge of the platform and also run on a wall.

Every nine levels, the scene completely changes, bringing in new unseen challenges! You can retry as many times as you want, but some maps might have as an objective a maximum amount of deaths. Each level will bring a different set of objectives for you to complete. There're five kinds of goals: maximum time, maximum deaths, pick-up coins, reach the height, climb less than x times, and wall run less than x times. Achieving the objectives will earn you coins that you can spend to get better characters and different skins!

Reach the portal at the end of each level to complete it and proceed to the next one. There's a total of 24 characters in the game; their speed and jump height may vary, so pick the one that fits your play style! And for each character, there're five different skins, to customize them as you want.

Crazy Parkour Tips
  • Play the tutorial level until you understand how far you can jump
  • Wall jumps will take you twice as far as regular jumps
  • You can climb back a platform if you're falling from it
  • Moving sideways is slower than forward, in some maps, this is the key to success
  • Remember the tricky parts where you failed so you know what to do next time
  • On harder levels there're checkpoints, reach the green flag to active it.
